attributes.action: Get Damien Nettles an active investigation
attributes.background:
Damien Nettles disappeared from the Isle of Wight on Nov 2nd 1996, he was 16. 
Crucial records,including the log of calls made to police that night are gone, police notebooks were not retained, and even details of which officers were on duty that night have now been lost.We need a new investigation

rejection.details:
The Independent Police Complaints Commission, not the Government or Parliament, conducts independent investigations of the police. You can find out more about the IPCC, including how to make a complaint, here:

https://www.ipcc.gov.uk/complaints
